summary:
A black and blue armor that replaces the original Glassarmor.
Includes female, male and shield.
UPDATE: Includes Weapons now
descriptionHtml:
A black and blue armor that replaces the original Glassarmor.
Including female, male and shield.
UPDATE: Includes Weapons now

I did this one to be able to play my character in my favorite armor (so far) and my favorite colors.
Perhaps some of you might like it aswell so I put it here.

Install:
The usual way: Just put the data folder into your Skyrim directory. 
                      Replace old files if neccessary.

Hope you like it.
author: Onfinay
